casebody.data:
ALBRO J. NEWTON CO. v. ERICKSON et al. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. November 27, 1914.)

Appeal from Special Term, Kings County.

Action by the Albro J. Newton Company against Henry Erickson and others. From a judgment for plaintiff, defendants appeal. Affirmed. See, also, 150 N. Y. Supp. 1073.

Argued before JENKS, P. J., and BURR, THOMAS, CARR, and RICH, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, upon the authority of Bossert v. Dhuy, 151 N. Y. Supp. 877, decided herewith.
